original_text: After they had eaten supper, Jesus took a cup of wine. He spoke to his disciples again. He said, ‘This cup shows my blood that will pour out when I die. God now makes a new agreement to save people because of my death. Whenever you drink from the cup in this way, do it to remember me.’
korean_text: 식후에 또한 그와 같이 잔을 가지시고 이르시되 이 잔은 내 피로 세운 새 언약이니 이것을 행하여 마실 때마다 나를 기념하라 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: Jesus took a cup of wine
He spoke to his disciples again
that will pour out when I die
God now makes a new agreement
to save people because of my death
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 죽음으로 인해 사람들을 구원하기 위한 언약입니다

sentences.original_text: Whenever you drink from the cup in this way
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이런 방식으로 잔을 마실 때마다
